transcript:
Executive: Hi, if you record your name and reason for calling, I'll see if this person is available.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Hanji.
Executive: Good afternoon sir, Rahul ji se baat ho rahi hai?
Customer: Hanji madam.
Executive: Sir India Mart se Ruchi baat kar rahe the, actually kal Navneet ji se baat hui thi, to unhone bola tha ki aapse connect karne ke liye. To abhi aapse baat ho rahi hai. Actually hum service ke regarding hi connect kar rahe the, kyunki abhi aap thoda sa engage bhi nahi ho rahe the aur kuch service se related aapka kuch concern bhi raise hua tha to uske liye hi connect kar rahe the hum.
Customer: Hanji madam, bataiye.
Executive: Ji sir. Ab pehle to services kaisi chal rahi hai sir India Mart se?
Customer: India Mart ki taraf se madam sahi hai, but abhi actually hum log offsite market pe jyada dhyan de rahe hain.
Executive: Okay. To jaise hum log ka offline jyada achcha chal raha hai market.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To nahi sir jaise aap wo achchi baat hai lekin thoda sa hume kya hota hai kyunki hume India Mart hamari company ko ek online presence de raha hai agar koi search kar raha hai Top Novelty Agro to wo hume search hoke aa raha hai. To uski bhi thodi si listing expected ho jati hai jab hum log buylead yaani kyunki na India Mart jo AI ke taraf work karta hai to usko hamari activeness nahi dikhti hai. To listing agar hamari Jaipur Rajasthan mein hai na to usme bhi thoda sa effect kar deta hai. To ye bahut achcha hai ki hamara offline bahut achcha chal raha hai but kyunki humne online presence bhi hai hamara ek bahut achcha humne India Mart se apna company register karaya hai. To hum log na uske liye agar suppose aap thoda sa bhi buylead aap lijiye aap thode se buyer ke sath thoda sa bhi connect kariye jab bhi aap din mein ek baar do baar jab bhi aap free ho pa rahe hain.
Customer: Wo hum karte rehte hain jaise hume time milta rehta hai hum karte rehte hain aur baki jo hamare paas calls wagera aate hain India Mart ke through to hum usse bhi proper response dete hain.
Executive: Haan nahi nahi sir wo to hai hi kyunki thoda sa hum log bhi nahi abhi waise hum log jaise kya hota hai na hum log ko hamesha jab aap use nahi karte to hamare yahan bhi concern raise ho jata hai ki aap use nahi kar rahe to hum aapse kahe ki aap use karein taki listing especially jo hai wo listing effect na ho. To usi ke liye hum aapse connect kar rahe the bas kal Navneet ji se thodi si baat hui thi par sir ne bola ki hum aapse connect karenge kyunki aap jyada India Mart aap dekhte hain.
Customer: Ji ji madam.
Executive: Ji sir to jaise aap thoda sa jaise aapko inquiry calls kuch aa rahe hain kya ek mahine aaye kuch inquiry calls November mein?
Customer: Haan ji madam.
Executive: Achcha sir to kaisa response reh raha hai buyer se?
Customer: Madam actually jo hamare paas India Mart ke through calls aate hain usme mostly hum log hum logo ko jo wo yaani samne wale ko jo demand rehti hai wo retail ke purpose se rehti hai. Hum try karte hain usko wholesale mein convert karne ki but kai baar hota hai ki nahi ho pata hai. To uska to koi waise extra issue nahi hai hume kyunki hum log apna best de dete hain usko convert karne ki.
Executive: Haan ye best hai sir aur hume thoda aap kyunki aap to aap jyada business jante ho to thoda follow up aur jo bhi cheezein hai to wo bhi aap thoda maintain kare rahein.
Executive: Baki na buyers ke call aa hi rahe hain to wo achchi baat hai lekin thoda sa jaise aapko buylead agar aapko requirement agar nahi lag raha hai lekin fir bhi na aap jaise aise hi randomly kabhi ek din mein do din mein aap aise scroll kariye aur buylead section mein jaake wo aaye hue customer ke sath engage karne ka thoda sa try karega. Ye jo customer engagement ka section hamare yahan raise hota hai na wo fir band ho jata hai. To uski thodi si listing mein bhi dikat jati hai aur thoda sa overall catalog hum log ka kafi achcha hai lekin thoda sa hum log na reviews bhi aap jaise agar maan lijiye kuch offline bhi hamare clients hain jo hamare genuine clients hain to hum unse bhi thoda sa make sure karein ki wo bhi hume rate karein kyunki hamara jo rating hai wo matlab abhi zero pe chal raha hai ekdam. To thoda sa haan thoda sa isse bhi hum log ka catalog ka score bhi isse thodi si improve hogi. To aap thoda sa make sure karega ki jab bhi aap thoda sa matlab jo bhi hamare offline hai hamare customers jo hamare genuine customers hain hum unko make sure karein ki unse hum connect karein aur unse unse bhi kahein ki hume reviews dein. Kyunki being as an hum log bhi customer banke jate hain to hum log review aur rating ko kafi importance dete hain.
Customer: Thik hai madam, main karwa dunga.
Executive: Haan aur ek cheez jaise hum log ne number waise to humne aapke aur Navneet sir ke map diye hain to koi aur extra number hume map karana hoga?
Customer: Nahi madam.
Executive: To abhi do number hi rehne dein?
Customer: Ji madam.
Executive: Hmm, thik hai sir baki overall cheezein sahi hai catalog bhi abhi hum log ka score bhi kafi achcha hai to catalog mein abhi to koi modification ki jarurat nahi hai but haan aap apne side se agar aapko lage ki kuch bhi usme hume modify karne ki requirement lag rahi hai to aap ek baar jarur apne bihaf pe check kar lijiyega aur make sure karega thoda sa reviews jarur check karega aap bhi apne side se reviews aap panel mein jaake review section mein profile mein review section aata hai aap wahan se ek baar check karega. To thoda sa reviews pe hume thoda sa improve karne ki jarurat hai overall thik hai sir fir hum aapse further connect kar lenge aap make sure karega ki ek baar buylead section thoda sa review karega thik hai?
Customer: Thik hai madam.
Executive: Okay okay sir thank you thank you so much for your time.
Customer: Thank you. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is focusing more on offline market.

- Low customer engagement on IndiaMART platform.

- Catalog rating is at zero.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the importance of online presence.

- Executive asked to engage with buyleads.

- Executive requested to get reviews from offline clients.



Next Steps: 

- Customer agreed to get reviews.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog, reviews, offline clients
